addJurStatus(address,uint256).details: addJurStatus - function to let the Jur admin add new address as a Jur Status, thus validating it's license which can be verified on the blockchain.

params._statusHolder: - The address which will hold the Jur Status.
params._statusType: - The position of the value from the statusTypes array signifying the status type.

addStatusType(string).details: addStatusType - function to let an admin add status types to support the bussiness logic.

changeState(address,bool).details: changeState - function to let the Jur admin change the state of a status.

params._statusHolder: - The address holding the Jur Status.
